resources.string: In the following question, select the related word pair from the given alternatives: \nTuberculosis:Lungs :: Typhoid : ?

Welcome to the Exam Hosting App, a platform designed for educators and learners to create, share, and participate in multiple-choice question (MCQ) exams. Our app enables users to host exams, track performance, and analyze results in an efficient and user-friendly environment.
Host Exams: Users can create and host their own MCQ exams with customizable questions.
Share Exam IDs: Easily share your unique exam ID with participants to invite them to take your exam.
Search Functionality: Quickly find exams by entering the exam ID in the search option.
Exam Results: After completing an exam, participants can view their results immediately.
History Section: Keep track of all your exam attempts, including scores and feedback.
Analyze Performance: Get insights into your performance with detailed results and statistics for each exam.
Reattempt Exams: Participants can reattempt exams to improve their scores or understanding of the material.
Save Questions: Users can save questions for future reference or study.
Report Questions: If you encounter any issues with a question, you can easily report it for review.
Review User Reports: As an exam host, view reports submitted by users regarding your questions for quality control.
Edit Profile: Users can manage their profiles, update personal information, and customize settings for a better experience.
We are committed to continuously improving our app. If you have any feedback or need assistance, please reach out to our support team through the app.
